from flask import Flask, request, jsonify
from flask_sqlalchemy import SQLAlchemy

app = Flask(__name__)
app.config['SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI'] = 'sqlite:///invoice_db.db'
engine = SQLAlchemy(app)

db = engine.engine

class Invoices(db.Model):
    __tablename__ = 'invoices'

    in_date = db.Column(db.Date, nullable=False)
    overdue = db.Column(db.Boolean, nullable=False)
    status = db.Column(db.String(12), nullable=False)
    amount = db.Column(db.Numeric(8), nullable=False)
    vendor_id = db.Column(db.Integer, nullable=False)
    vendor = db.Column(db.String(15), nullable=False)

class Invoice(db.Model):
    __tablename__ = 'invoices'

    invoice_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('invoices.id'))
    vendor_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('invoices.vendor_id'))
    invoice_date = db.Column(db.Date, nullable=False)
    amount = db.Column(db.Numeric(8), nullable=False)
    status = db.Column(db.String(12), nullable=False)

@app.route('/delete_invoice', methods=['POST'])
def delete_invoice():
    invoice_id = request.form['invoice_id']
    query = """DELETE FROM invoices WHERE id = %s""" % invoice_id

    db.session.execute(query)
    db.session.commit()

    return jsonify({'status': 'ok'})

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app.run()
